constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 150 (Monday, September 19, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. MOORE of Wisconsin:
H.R. 8886.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The Congress enacts this bill pursuant to Section 8 of
Article I of the United States Constitution and Amendment XVI
of the United States Constitution.
[Page H7966]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: Promoting Clarity in Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Treatment Act
